name: Grab and Bonk
description:
CONTROLS: WASD

What happens when you combine the gameloop of pacman, roguelike genre, and gta... Yes a jetpack gangster...

Collect all the coins scattered around while evading the flying enemies ready to hit you in the head, Grab your own weapon to knock down enemies in the sky.

Every loop changes the stage which will challenge you and keeps the game new.
-Simple controls
-Minimalistic design
